subject: Basketball
Blood Clots
Deep-Vein Thrombosis
lead_paragraph: Mirza Teletovic’s season ended in January when he was found to have clots in his lungs, and questions about clots have reverberated around the N.B.A.
snippet: Mirza Teletovic’s season ended in January when he was found to have clots in his lungs, and questions about clots have reverberated around the N.B.A.
